description:
This time around I've pulled from the very top of the war chest to bring you an extra special hottie that I met Halloween weekend at a beach bar here. This hot sailor is one hell of a character and I've quickly become very fond of him. Payne is one of those guys that's up for adventure and more than willing to do something wild and crazy.

The night I met him I was roaming from bar to bar at the beach and seen him stroll passed in a red toga as he showed off his great body under the skimpy sheets. His friends seemed to gravitate around him and I spotted him immediately and ditched my quest for the next free beer and eased up next to him in the hallway as he waited for the restroom to come free. I slid him my card, disappeared in the bathroom ahead of him into the john. The rest is history. Payne has become one of my favorites!
title: Payne
